name: Charlotte
description: Charlotte is a horror-puzzle walking sim based on the short story, The Yellow Wall-paper.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
